dropzone.text: Drag and drop files or <1>click</1> to select
dropzone.label: File Upload

supported.description: We support conversions between the following formats:

examples.title: üí° Conversion Examples
examples.video: ‚Ä¢ **Video:** MP4 ‚Üí AVI, MOV, WebM, MP3, WAV etc.
examples.document: ‚Ä¢ **Documents:** DOCX ‚Üí PDF, DOC, ODT, RTF, TXT
examples.spreadsheet: ‚Ä¢ **Spreadsheets:** XLSX ‚Üí XLS, ODS, CSV, TXT (PDF excluded)

pdfWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è PDF Conversion Limitations
pdfWarning.description:
**Conversion from PDF to other formats is not supported.**
PDF can only be used as an output target for conversion from other formats. (e.g., DOCX ‚Üí PDF, XLSX ‚Üí PDF)

koreanSupport.title: üéØ Korean Language Support
koreanSupport.description: Korean text is fully supported in all document conversions. Korean characters display correctly in PDF conversions without showing as squares (‚ñ°).

unsupported.description: The following file formats are not supported for security reasons:

types.pdf: ‚ö†Ô∏è PDF files (.pdf) - Cannot be used as input

warnings.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes
warnings.pdf: ‚Ä¢ **PDF:** Conversion to PDF from other formats is possible, but conversion from PDF to other formats is not supported
warnings.presentation: ‚Ä¢ **Presentations:** PPT, PPTX, ODP files are not supported by LibreOffice converter
warnings.spreadsheetPdf: ‚Ä¢ **Spreadsheet PDF:** Excel to PDF conversion is currently not supported
warnings.apple: ‚Ä¢ Apple formats are not supported due to compatibility issues
warnings.archive: ‚Ä¢ Archive files are not supported due to content verification difficulties
warnings.executable: ‚Ä¢ Executable files are blocked for security reasons
warnings.corrupted: ‚Ä¢ Corrupted files may fail to convert

unsupportedFile.title: Unsupported File Format
unsupportedFile.description: **{{fileName}}** is a {{fileType}} and is currently not supported for conversion.

pdfGuide.title: üìÑ **PDF Conversion Guide:**
pdfGuide.output: ‚Ä¢ PDF can only be used as a conversion **output target**
pdfGuide.examples: ‚Ä¢ Convert other documents to PDF: DOCX ‚Üí PDF, XLSX ‚Üí PDF, PPTX ‚Üí PDF
pdfGuide.limitation: ‚Ä¢ Conversion from PDF to other formats is not possible due to technical limitations

alternatives.title: üí° Please try using files in the following formats instead:
alternatives.document: ‚Ä¢ Documents: DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, TXT (can be converted to PDF)
alternatives.image: ‚Ä¢ Images: JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP

warnings.tokenExpired: Download token has expired. Please convert the file again for security.
warnings.tokenInvalid: Download token has expired or is invalid. Please convert the file again.

feedback.title: User Feedback
feedback.description: Feel free to report bugs, suggest features, improvements, or any other feedback.

anonymous.notice: üí° We send your feedback anonymously. Share your thoughts safely without any personal information collection.

email.label: Email Address
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email format.

messages.success: Thank you for your valuable feedback! We will review and contact you.
messages.error: Failed to send feedback. Please try again later.
messages.networkError: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection.
messages.rateLimitError: Too many requests. Please try again in 5 minutes.
messages.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
messages.badRequestError: Invalid request. Please check your input.

errors.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later.

boundary.title: An unknown error occurred.
boundary.message: Please refresh the page or contact the administrator.

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.

preview.title: Conversion Result Preview
preview.unsupported: Preview not supported for this file type.
